{
  "budgetId": 123,           // optional; helps auto-generate concept when present
  "accountId": 5,            // optional
  "costCenterId": 9,         // optional
  "clientId": 42,            // optional
  "date": "2026-01-17",      // ISO date string
  "amount": 150000,          // optional; calculated from lines if omitted
  "currencyId": 1,           // required (e.g., 1 = CLP)
  "paymentMethodId": 1,      // optional
  "documentTypeId": 1,       // optional
  "documentNumber": "F12345",// optional; if provided, payment is marked as 'paid' and not projected
  "concept": "Pago de anticipo", // optional; auto-set if omitted and budgetId provided
  "status": "paid"           // optional; allowed: paid | pending | voided
  "isProjected": true,       // optional; marks payment as projected. Ignored if documentNumber provided
  "receivedAt": "2026-01-17T10:00:00.000Z", // optional; ISO datetime string
  "lines": [
    {
      "bugetProductId": 1,    // optional; either this or bugetItemId must be provided
      "bugetItemId": null,    // optional; either this or bugetProductId must be provided
      "amount": 75000         // optional; amount paid for this item
    },
    {
      "bugetProductId": null,
      "bugetItemId": 2,
      "amount": 75000
    }
  ]
}

{
  "budgetId": 123,           // optional; helps auto-generate concept when present
  "accountId": 5,            // optional
  "costCenterId": 9,         // optional
  "clientId": 42,            // optional
  "date": "2026-01-17",      // ISO date string
  "amount": 150000,          // optional; calculated from lines if omitted
  "currencyId": 1,           // required (e.g., 1 = CLP)
  "paymentMethodId": 1,      // optional
  "documentTypeId": 1,       // optional
  "documentNumber": "F12345",// optional; if provided, payment is marked as 'paid' and not projected
  "concept": "Pago de anticipo", // optional; auto-set if omitted and budgetId provided
  "status": "paid"           // optional; allowed: paid | pending | voided
  "isProjected": true,       // optional; marks payment as projected. Ignored if documentNumber provided
  "receivedAt": "2026-01-17T10:00:00.000Z", // optional; ISO datetime string
  "lines": [
    {
      "bugetProductId": 1,    // optional; either this or bugetItemId must be provided
      "bugetItemId": null,    // optional; either this or bugetProductId must be provided
      "amount": 75000         // optional; amount paid for this item
    },
    {
      "bugetProductId": null,
      "bugetItemId": 2,
      "amount": 75000
    }
  ]
}

{
  "accountId": 5,            // optional
  "costCenterId": 9,         // optional
  "clientId": 42,            // optional
  "date": "2026-01-17",      // optional; ISO date string
  "amount": 150000,          // optional
  "currencyId": 1,           // optional
  "paymentMethodId": 1,      // optional
  "documentTypeId": 1,       // optional
  "documentNumber": "F12345",// optional
  "concept": "Updated concept", // optional
  "status": "pending"        // optional; allowed: paid | pending | voided
  "isProjected": false,      // optional; toggle projected status
  "receivedAt": "2026-01-17T10:00:00.000Z", // optional; ISO datetime string
  "lines": [
    {
      "bugetProductId": 1,    // optional; either this or bugetItemId
      "bugetItemId": null,    // optional; either this or bugetProductId
      "amount": 150000        // optional
    }
  ]
}
